import { Button } from "@mui/material" import ItemCount from "../ItemCount/ItemCount" import { useState } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const ItemDetail = ({data}) => { const addProductToCart = () =>{ console.log("Producto a agregar: ", data) } console.log("Data desde ItemDetail: ", data) const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState (1) console.log("ver cantidad" , quantity) const [showButton, setShowButton] = useState (false) return ( <>

{data.title}

) } export default ItemDetail
